name: Samiksha Dubey
bio: Dynamic and highly skilled Lead Frontend Developer with a proven track record in creating cutting-edge web applications using React.js, Redux, Redux Toolkit, RTK Query, Redux Thunk, and Redux Saga. Proficient in JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3 and SCSS. Adept at implementing scalable, responsive, and performant user interfaces. Seeking a challenging role to lead and inspire development teams to deliver exceptional front-end solutions.
skills: Frontend Technologies: React.js, Redux, Redux Toolkit, RTK Query, Redux Thunk, Redux Saga, HTML5, CSS3, SCSS
Version Control: Git, Bitbucket, AWS Codecommit
Testing: Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Electronics and Telecommunications

responsibilities: Working as a senior frontend developer in developing a portfolio management application for investment bankers
Leading a team of senior frontend developers, and worked on architecture of the application from scratch
Utilized the latest version of React and Typscript to build a highly scalable application
Collaborated closely with UI/UX designers to ensure pixel-perfect implementation of designs, following best practices in HTML, CSS, and SCSS
Conducted code reviews, mentored junior developers, and maintained coding standards to maintain code quality and consistency
Introduced unit and integration testing using React Testing Library and Jest to ensure code reliability
Led and mentored a team of front-end developers to deliver high-quality web applications for clients across diverse industries
Architected and implemented complex features using React.js, ensuring high performance and optimal user experience
Utilized Redux, Redux Toolkit, Redux Thunk, and Redux Saga for effective state management, enabling real-time updates
Collaborated closely with UI/UX designers to ensure pixel-perfect implementation of designs, following best practices in HTML, CSS, and SCSS
Optimized web applications for performance and speed, including lazy loading, code splitting, and efficient data retrieval
Introduced unit and integration testing using React Testing Library, Jest and Cypress to ensure code reliability
Developed and maintained several high-traffic web applications for e-commerce clients using React.js and related technologies
Worked closely with the product team to define requirements and translate them into technical specifications and user stories
Implemented responsive web design principles to ensure a seamless experience across various devices and screen sizes
Created custom reusable UI components and optimized rendering for improved performance
Collaborated with backend developers to design API integrations and enhance overall system architecture
Engaged in regular code refactoring and performance tuning to boost application speed
Actively participated in knowledge sharing and trained junior developers on best practices and tools
Contributed to developing and maintaining web applications using React.js
Collaborated with senior developers to design and implement new features and user interfaces
Assisted in creating responsive designs and mobile optimizations
Gained experience in state management with Redux and Redux Thunk
Participated in regular code reviews and effort estimations
